me_no_target: You'd better find someone else to moo at.
me_self: You settle down into the center of your bovine Zen; the foolish world thinks you're just mooing.
actor_room: $n turns cowlike eyes on you, chews $s cud, and moos plaintively.
me_room: You chew your cud and moo plaintively.  Muh-OOOOO!
actor_self: $n is mooing at $mself again...  You look for an exit...
actor_other: Slowly, $n looks at $N, chews $s cud, and muh-OOOOs!
actor_me: $n moos at you.  What could that possibly mean?
me_actor: You focus all your bovine Zen on $N, and speak your thoughts.  Muh-OOOOO!
